_header: Sith that I am your have been and shall
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, Devotion to his Mistress, translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 183) — three 8-line stanzas (ababbcbc) and 4-line Envoy

BLHar682.First Lines:
Syn that y am yowre haue ben & shallWithouten part of
                    elliswhere servise…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…To sett oure hertis more at restAnd shall ben even as y koude
                    wisshe it were
BLHar682.Facsimiles:
